reviewText: This is my favorite anime of all time. I am truly excited to even find the 2 boxset for this anime. This show is amazing and if anyone loves a great plot with twist and turns. Then you shall truly enjoy this boxset! The one thing I notice is that the boxset states that you are to receive a OST with the 2 boxset i did not get one in my boxse and i haven't heard of anyone receiving theirs either. maybe it was a typo on the information.
